long_description: The URBANEARS Humlan Headphones / Bagis Earbuds combo gives you the best of two worlds: Enjoy big sound and padded comfort with the Humlan Headphones or go low-profile with the Bagis Earbuds. Wash-and-wear Humlan Headphones pack big sound with a minimal design; the headband and ear cushions can be easily removed and thrown in the wash. ZoundPlug socket lets you share your music with a friend; simply plug another pair of headphones in via the outlet on the ear cap and enjoy your tunes together. Built-in microphone and remote allow for picking up calls and hands-free talking. The URBANEARS Humlan Headphones feature a tangle-resistant cord with a 3.5mm stereo plug. The URBANEARS Bagis Earbuds offer a minimalist version of the full URBANEARS experience, with an earplug design that provides direct sound and efficient noise reduction. Rubber housing and fabric/thermoplastic elastomer cord with 3.5mm stereo plug help eliminate sound distortions caused by friction. The URBANEARS Bagis Earbuds snap together, allowing you to carry them around your neck when they're not in use.
short_description: The URBANEARS Humlan Headphones / Bagis Earbuds combo gives you the best of two worlds: Enjoy big sound and padded comfort with the Humlan Headphones or go low-profile with the Bagis Earbuds.
